main event: A couple observed an unidentified object that whizzed over their car in Henderson, North Carolina on 16 April 1956.
interesting points: The object was seen briefly for 1-2 seconds and changed shape from mushroom to boomerang., The observers could not determine the color or size of the object., The couple requested to remain anonymous due to concerns over publicity., The sighting occurred just before dawn on a lonely road., Initial conclusions considered it to be a possible kite or balloon.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a kite
witness description: a couple who did not wish to disclose their identities
